trends: There have been 55 other sightings in Ottawa
There were no other sightings in Ottawa on or around August 27th 1953
Summary: standing in farm with witnesess when heard a high pitched motor type noise looked in the direction and a object with occupants was observed at about 300 feet.
divs: Sighting Detailsthis event occured i believe in august 1953 i was 8 years old a number of people were with me in the barn yard when our attention was directed to a high pitched engine type noise. we look toward the noise and in the air at tree top level appeared what looked like a expeditor sized twin engined aircraft its propellers were tokenly turning .the vehicle was about 300 feet away and had larger type portholes down the left side. the occupants were observing us from the portholes the pilot and copilot could be seen perfectly as could those in the portholes,they appeared to be wearing snow white flight suits extremely large white helmets and extra large round dark sunglasses we looked at them they looked at us my impression was they were almost as surprised to see us as we were to see them.there speed was only that of about walking speed there appeared to be some quick movements in the cockpit and the vehicle did a side slip to its right and disappeared behind a small hill we ran toward what we believed was the crash site expecting a explosion nothing appeared to be there that was it.i believe that this was attempted to be reported as a aircraft crash however since no aircraft were missing nothing was done the person who reported this i believed worked at carp airport whoever he spoke to according to him advised him it was not a aircraft we had seen but something else .,it was impossible for a conventional aircraft to do what this vehicle did .the sighting lasted only a minute or so however that day seemed one of the longest days of my life.approximately a month later a school chum and myself observed a large wooden barrel object with what looked like castiron pipes at right angles protruding from it a large cloud was over it and what appeared as a rope or cable was hanging from it no noise was evident this was again at tree top level and only about 200 feet away the object paced us and eventually disappeared behind some taller trees sighting lasted 2 to 3 minutes.
